EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_DataWarehousingGreenplum_eBook_Q217.Download Confirma
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading the Data Warehousing with Greenplum eBook
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Data Warehousing with Greenplum O’Reilly eBook. We hope you found it informative and helpful.
Given your interest in this eBook, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]>
- Webinar: Cloud-Native Data: What Data Questions to Ask When Building Cloud-Native Apps <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-15-cloud-native-data-what-data-questions-to-ask-when-building-cloud-native-apps-webinar]]> - White Paper: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation-white-paper]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]>
- Customer Video: How Conversant uses Pivotal Greenplum in the Cloud <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k5ldXlVNFw0]]>
- Case Study: Aridhia - Creating a Platform to Power the Next Generation of Clinical and Translational Informatics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/aridhia]]>
- Case Study: O’Reilly Media - Enabling Rapid Analysis of Huge Quantities of Data <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/oreilly]]>
- Community Video: Learn about the Greenplum Database <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sn971CLnTxI]]>
- Demo: Running Teradata Client Applications on Greenplum with Hyper-Q <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KS9_AlCvgiI&t=7s]]>
- Learn more: Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum]]>
- Download: Greenplum Sandbox <[[http://greenplum.org/]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
